value: We have to take sometimes so many decisions which are very tedious. For example, students that have passed in a class of 60 students.
Once we code a computer with conditionals then they would be able to make decisions on their own and things will become less tedious for us.
Also, underlined things are called conditions and italic things are called decisions. Both together are called conditional statements.
If you pick a red colour card then you will get 10 points
If you pick a red jack/queen/king then you will get 15 points
Think of at least one example when you see conditionals in real life?
